title: Portugal - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: 11,176 BDT (Embassy Fee for Adults) + 4,000 BDT (Chologhuri Processing Fee) + Travel Insurance & Notary extra
validity: Typically up to 90 days within 180 days (Schengen short-stay)

details.title: Eligibility
items: Valid Bangladeshi passport with at least 7 months validity from travel date
Photographs (35mm x 40mm, not older than 3 months, unused in prior visas)
Personal bank statement (last 6 months) and solvency certificate
Proof of employment or business ownership with salary slips and employer certificates
Invitation letter (if visiting someone in Portugal)
Confirmed or tentative hotel booking and round-trip flight booking
Travel health insurance with adequate Schengen coverage
TIN certificate and NID (notarized for both applicant and spouse)
Proof of financial stability such as FDR, property, and asset documents
Marital status and family background information (marriage certificate, parents’ details)
Student ID and certificate (if applicable)

details.title: Required Documents
items: Valid passport with at least 7 months validity
Three recent photographs (35x40mm, matte finish)
Visiting card
No Objection Certificate (NOC)
Forwarding letter from the applicant
Invitation letter (if applicable)
Bank statement (last 6 months) and solvency certificate
Salary slips (last 3 months) with company seal
Savings/asset documents (FDR, property, etc.)
Employment certificate with full details (name, position, salary, leave dates)
Travel health insurance (individual or corporate with full coverage details)
TIN certificate (notarized)
NID copy of applicant and spouse (notarized)
Travel itinerary (detailed plan with dates and places)
Current home address and duration of residence for applicant and spouse
Parents’ names, addresses, and birthdates
Trip budget breakdown (if applicable)
Name, address, passport number of any relative/friend in France (if applicable)
Marriage certificate (notarized)
Student ID (if applicable)
Flight booking confirmation
Hotel booking confirmation
